attributes.action: talk to the nation and tell us what you intend to do about the problems faced currently in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the PM and his Cabinet to inform the public of their decisions and rulings so that we have the chance to voice them. This would give the voter a chance to make their country better and also restore faith in the poitical system because even if you don't acknowledge then concerns on legislation, then at least we have a window to air our worries!

rejection.details: The PM and his Cabinet regularly inform the public of their decisions, therefore it is unclear what you are requesting. Please provide more specific detail before resubmiting your petition.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
